short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flatter Files is a cloud based service that allows companies to distribute drawings and other controlled documentation directly toâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flatter Files is a cloud based service that allows companies to distribute drawings and other controlled documentation directly to viewers in a controlled and secure manner. This Flatter Files extension adds support for printing and viewing content using a desktop application from the Flatter Files web application. This allows viewing of unique CAD data in an appropriate desktop application and if desired allows printing of PDFs from a local desktop application instead of the browser.
